verses.verse: In the first <S%H2298><s%> year <S%H8140><s%> of Belshazzar <S%H1113><s%> king <S%H4430><s%> of Babylon <S%H895><s%> Daniel <S%H1841><s%> had <S%H2370><s%> <S%H8754><s%> a dream <S%H2493><s%> and visions <S%H2376><s%> of his head <S%H7217><s%> upon <S%H5922><s%> his bed <S%H4903><s%>: then <S%H116><s%> he wrote <S%H3790><s%> <S%H8754><s%> the dream <S%H2493><s%>, and told <S%H560><s%> <S%H8754><s%> the sum <S%H7217><s%> of the matters <S%H4406><s%>.

Daniel <S%H1841><s%> spake <S%H6032><s%> <S%H8750><s%> and said <S%H560><s%> <S%H8750><s%>, I saw <S%H2370><s%> <S%H8751><s%> <S%H1934><s%> <S%H8754><s%> in my vision <S%H2376><s%> by <S%H5974><s%> night <S%H3916><s%>, and, behold <S%H718><s%>, the four <S%H703><s%> winds <S%H7308><s%> of the heaven <S%H8065><s%> strove <S%H1519><s%> <S%H8683><s%> upon the great <S%H7229><s%> sea <S%H3221><s%>.

And four <S%H703><s%> great <S%H7260><s%> beasts <S%H2423><s%> came up <S%H5559><s%> <S%H8751><s%> from <S%H4481><s%> the sea <S%H3221><s%>, diverse <S%H8133><s%> <S%H8750><s%> one <S%H1668><s%> from <S%H4481><s%> another <S%H1668><s%>.

The first <S%H6933><s%> was like a lion <S%H744><s%>, and had eagle's <S%H5403><s%> wings <S%H1611><s%>: I beheld <S%H1934><s%> <S%H8754><s%> <S%H2370><s%> <S%H8751><s%> till <S%H5705><s%> the wings <S%H1611><s%> thereof were plucked <S%H4804><s%> <S%H8760><s%>, and it was lifted up <S%H5191><s%> <S%H8760><s%> from <S%H4481><s%> the earth <S%H772><s%>, and made stand <S%H6966><s%> <S%H8717><s%> upon <S%H5922><s%> the feet <S%H7271><s%> as a man <S%H606><s%>, and a man's <S%H606><s%> heart <S%H3825><s%> was given <S%H3052><s%> <S%H8753><s%> to it.

And behold <S%H718><s%> another <S%H317><s%> beast <S%H2423><s%>, a second <S%H8578><s%>, like <S%H1821><s%> <S%H8751><s%> to a bear <S%H1678><s%>, and it raised up <S%H6966><s%> <S%H8684><s%> itself on one <S%H2298><s%> side <S%H7859><s%>, and it had three <S%H8532><s%> ribs <S%H5967><s%> in the mouth <S%H6433><s%> of it between <S%H997><s%> the teeth <S%H8128><s%> of it: and they said <S%H560><s%> <S%H8750><s%> thus <S%H3652><s%> unto it, Arise <S%H6966><s%> <S%H8747><s%>, devour <S%H399><s%> <S%H8747><s%> much <S%H7690><s%> flesh <S%H1321><s%>.

After <S%H870><s%> this <S%H1836><s%> I beheld <S%H1934><s%> <S%H8754><s%> <S%H2370><s%> <S%H8751><s%>, and lo <S%H718><s%> another <S%H317><s%>, like a leopard <S%H5245><s%>, which had upon <S%H5922><s%> the back <S%H1355><s%> of it four <S%H703><s%> wings <S%H1611><s%> of a fowl <S%H5776><s%>; the beast <S%H2423><s%> had also four <S%H703><s%> heads <S%H7217><s%>; and dominion <S%H7985><s%> was given <S%H3052><s%> <S%H8753><s%> to it.

After <S%H870><s%> this <S%H1836><s%> I saw <S%H1934><s%> <S%H8754><s%> <S%H2370><s%> <S%H8751><s%> in the night <S%H3916><s%> visions <S%H2376><s%>, and behold <S%H718><s%> a fourth <S%H7244><s%> beast <S%H2423><s%>, dreadful <S%H1763><s%> <S%H8753><s%> and terrible <S%H574><s%>, and strong <S%H8624><s%> exceedingly <S%H3493><s%>; and it had great <S%H7260><s%> iron <S%H6523><s%> teeth <S%H8128><s%>: it devoured <S%H399><s%> <S%H8750><s%> and brake in pieces <S%H1855><s%> <S%H8683><s%>, and stamped <S%H7512><s%> <S%H8751><s%> the residue <S%H7606><s%> with the feet <S%H7271><s%> of it: and it <S%H1932><s%> was diverse <S%H8133><s%> <S%H8743><s%> from <S%H4481><s%> all <S%H3606><s%> the beasts <S%H2423><s%> that were before <S%H6925><s%> it; and it had ten <S%H6236><s%> shofars <S%H7162><s%>.

I considered <S%H1934><s%> <S%H8754><s%> <S%H7920><s%> <S%H8723><s%> the shofars <S%H7162><s%>, and, behold <S%H431><s%>, there came up <S%H5559><s%> <S%H8754><s%> among <S%H997><s%> them another <S%H317><s%> little <S%H2192><s%> shofar <S%H7162><s%>, before <S%H6925><s%> <S%H4481><s%> whom there were three <S%H8532><s%> of <S%H4481><s%> the first <S%H6933><s%> shofars <S%H7162><s%> plucked up by the roots <S%H6132><s%> <S%H8725><s%>: and, behold <S%H431><s%>, in this <S%H1668><s%> shofar <S%H7162><s%> were eyes <S%H5870><s%> like the eyes <S%H5870><s%> of man <S%H606><s%>, and a mouth <S%H6433><s%> speaking <S%H4449><s%> <S%H8743><s%> great things <S%H7260><s%>.

I beheld <S%H1934><s%> <S%H8754><s%> <S%H2370><s%> <S%H8751><s%> till <S%H5705><s%> the thrones <S%H3764><s%> were cast down <S%H7412><s%> <S%H8752><s%>, and the Ancient <S%H6268><s%> of days <S%H3118><s%> did sit <S%H3488><s%> <S%H8754><s%>, whose garment <S%H3831><s%> was white <S%H2358><s%> as snow <S%H8517><s%>, and the hair <S%H8177><s%> of his head <S%H7217><s%> like the pure <S%H5343><s%> wool <S%H6015><s%>: his throne <S%H3764><s%> was like the fiery <S%H5135><s%> flame <S%H7631><s%>, and his wheels <S%H1535><s%> as burning <S%H1815><s%> <S%H8751><s%> fire <S%H5135><s%>.

A fiery <S%H5135><s%> stream <S%H5103><s%> issued <S%H5047><s%> <S%H8743><s%> and came forth <S%H5312><s%> <S%H8750><s%> from <S%H4481><s%> before <S%H6925><s%> him: thousand <S%H506><s%> thousands <S%H506><s%> ministered <S%H8120><s%> <S%H8741><s%> unto him, and ten thousand <S%H7240><s%> times ten thousand <S%H7240><s%> stood <S%H6966><s%> <S%H8748><s%> before <S%H6925><s%> him: the judgment <S%H1780><s%> was set <S%H3488><s%> <S%H8754><s%>, and the books <S%H5609><s%> were opened <S%H6606><s%> <S%H8760><s%>.

I beheld <S%H1934><s%> <S%H8754><s%> <S%H2370><s%> <S%H8751><s%> then <S%H116><s%> because <S%H4481><s%> of the voice <S%H7032><s%> of the great <S%H7260><s%> words <S%H4406><s%> which the shofar <S%H7162><s%> spake <S%H4449><s%> <S%H8743><s%>: I beheld <S%H1934><s%> <S%H8754><s%> <S%H2370><s%> <S%H8751><s%> even till <S%H5705><s%> the beast <S%H2423><s%> was slain <S%H6992><s%> <S%H8752><s%>, and his body <S%H1655><s%> destroyed <S%H7><s%> <S%H8717><s%>, and given <S%H3052><s%> <S%H8753><s%> to the burning <S%H3346><s%> flame <S%H785><s%>.

As concerning the rest <S%H7606><s%> of the beasts <S%H2423><s%>, they had their dominion <S%H7985><s%> taken away <S%H5709><s%> <S%H8684><s%>: yet their lives <S%H2417><s%> were prolonged <S%H3052><s%> <S%H8753><s%> for <S%H5705><s%> a season <S%H2166><s%> and time <S%H5732><s%>.

I saw <S%H1934><s%> <S%H8754><s%> <S%H2370><s%> <S%H8751><s%> in the night <S%H3916><s%> visions <S%H2376><s%>, and, behold <S%H718><s%>, one like the Son <S%H1247><s%> of man <S%H606><s%> came <S%H858><s%> <S%H8750><s%> with <S%H5974><s%> the clouds <S%H6050><s%> of heaven <S%H8065><s%>, and came <S%H4291><s%> <S%H8754><s%> to <S%H5705><s%> the Ancient <S%H6268><s%> of days <S%H3118><s%>, and they brought him near <S%H7127><s%> <S%H8684><s%> before <S%H6925><s%> him.

And there was given <S%H3052><s%> <S%H8753><s%> him dominion <S%H7985><s%>, and glory <S%H3367><s%>, and a kingdom <S%H4437><s%>, that all <S%H3606><s%> people <S%H5972><s%>, nations <S%H524><s%>, and languages <S%H3961><s%>, should serve <S%H6399><s%> <S%H8748><s%> him: his dominion <S%H7985><s%> is an everlasting <S%H5957><s%> dominion <S%H7985><s%>, which shall not <S%H3809><s%> pass away <S%H5709><s%> <S%H8748><s%>, and his kingdom <S%H4437><s%> that which shall not <S%H3809><s%> be destroyed <S%H2255><s%> <S%H8721><s%>.

I <S%H576><s%> Daniel <S%H1841><s%> was grieved <S%H3735><s%> <S%H8730><s%> in my spirit <S%H7308><s%> in the midst <S%H1459><s%> of my body <S%H5085><s%>, and the visions <S%H2376><s%> of my head <S%H7217><s%> troubled <S%H927><s%> <S%H8792><s%> me.

I came near <S%H7127><s%> <S%H8754><s%> unto <S%H5922><s%> one <S%H2298><s%> of <S%H4481><s%> them that stood by <S%H6966><s%> <S%H8750><s%>, and asked <S%H1156><s%> <S%H8748><s%> him <S%H4481><s%> the truth <S%H3330><s%> of all <S%H3606><s%> this <S%H1836><s%>. So he told <S%H560><s%> <S%H8754><s%> me, and made me know <S%H3046><s%> <S%H8681><s%> the interpretation <S%H6591><s%> of the things <S%H4406><s%>.

These <S%H459><s%> great <S%H7260><s%> beasts <S%H2423><s%>, which <S%H581><s%> are four <S%H703><s%>, are four <S%H703><s%> kings <S%H4430><s%>, which shall arise <S%H6966><s%> <S%H8748><s%> out of <S%H4481><s%> the earth <S%H772><s%>.

But the saints <S%H6922><s%> of Ha `Elyon <S%H5946><s%> shall take <S%H6902><s%> <S%H8741><s%> the kingdom <S%H4437><s%>, and possess <S%H2631><s%> <S%H8681><s%> the kingdom <S%H4437><s%> for <S%H5705><s%> ever <S%H5957><s%>, even for <S%H5705><s%> ever <S%H5957><s%> and ever <S%H5957><s%>.

Then <S%H116><s%> I would <S%H6634><s%> <S%H8754><s%> know the truth <S%H3321><s%> <S%H8742><s%> of <S%H5922><s%> the fourth <S%H7244><s%> beast <S%H2423><s%>, which was <S%H1934><s%> <S%H8754><s%> diverse <S%H8133><s%> <S%H8750><s%> from <S%H4481><s%> all <S%H3606><s%> the others, exceeding <S%H3493><s%> dreadful <S%H1763><s%> <S%H8753><s%>, whose teeth <S%H8128><s%> were of iron <S%H6523><s%>, and his nails <S%H2953><s%> of brass <S%H5174><s%>; which devoured <S%H399><s%> <S%H8750><s%>, brake in pieces <S%H1855><s%> <S%H8683><s%>, and stamped <S%H7512><s%> <S%H8751><s%> the residue <S%H7606><s%> with his feet <S%H7271><s%>;

And of <S%H5922><s%> the ten <S%H6236><s%> shofars <S%H7162><s%> that were in his head <S%H7217><s%>, and of the other <S%H317><s%> which came up <S%H5559><s%> <S%H8754><s%>, and before <S%H4481><s%> <S%H6925><s%> whom three <S%H8532><s%> fell <S%H5308><s%> <S%H8754><s%>; even of that shofar <S%H7162><s%> that <S%H1797><s%> had eyes <S%H5870><s%>, and a mouth <S%H6433><s%> that spake <S%H4449><s%> <S%H8743><s%> very great things <S%H7260><s%>, whose look <S%H2376><s%> was more <S%H4481><s%> stout <S%H7229><s%> than <S%H4481><s%> his fellows <S%H2273><s%>.

I beheld <S%H1934><s%> <S%H8754><s%> <S%H2370><s%> <S%H8751><s%>, and the same <S%H1797><s%> shofar <S%H7162><s%> made <S%H5648><s%> <S%H8751><s%> war <S%H7129><s%> with <S%H5974><s%> the saints <S%H6922><s%>, and prevailed <S%H3202><s%> <S%H8750><s%> against them;

Until <S%H5705><s%> the Ancient <S%H6268><s%> of days <S%H3118><s%> came <S%H858><s%> <S%H8754><s%> <S%H1768><s%>, and judgment <S%H1780><s%> was given <S%H3052><s%> <S%H8753><s%> to the saints <S%H6922><s%> of Ha `Elyon <S%H5946><s%>; and the time <S%H2166><s%> came <S%H4291><s%> <S%H8754><s%> that the saints <S%H6922><s%> possessed <S%H2631><s%> <S%H8684><s%> the kingdom <S%H4437><s%>.

Thus <S%H3652><s%> he said <S%H560><s%> <S%H8754><s%>, The fourth <S%H7244><s%> beast <S%H2423><s%> shall be <S%H1934><s%> <S%H8748><s%> the fourth <S%H7244><s%> kingdom <S%H4437><s%> upon earth <S%H772><s%>, which shall be diverse <S%H8133><s%> <S%H8748><s%> from <S%H4481><s%> all <S%H3606><s%> kingdoms <S%H4437><s%>, and shall devour <S%H399><s%> <S%H8748><s%> the whole <S%H3606><s%> earth <S%H772><s%>, and shall tread it down <S%H1759><s%> <S%H8748><s%>, and break it in pieces <S%H1855><s%> <S%H8681><s%>.

And the ten <S%H6236><s%> shofars <S%H7162><s%> out of <S%H4481><s%> this kingdom <S%H4437><s%> are ten <S%H6236><s%> kings <S%H4430><s%> that shall arise <S%H6966><s%> <S%H8748><s%>: and another <S%H321><s%> shall rise <S%H6966><s%> <S%H8748><s%> after <S%H311><s%> them; and he shall be diverse <S%H8133><s%> <S%H8748><s%> from <S%H4481><s%> the first <S%H6933><s%>, and he shall subdue <S%H8214><s%> <S%H8681><s%> three <S%H8532><s%> kings <S%H4430><s%>.

And he shall speak <S%H4449><s%> <S%H8741><s%> great words <S%H4406><s%> against <S%H6655><s%> Ha `Elyon <S%H5943><s%>, and shall wear out <S%H1080><s%> <S%H8741><s%> the saints <S%H6922><s%> of Ha `Elyon <S%H5946><s%>, and think <S%H5452><s%> <S%H8748><s%> to change <S%H8133><s%> <S%H8682><s%> times <S%H2166><s%> and Torahs <S%H1882><s%>: and they shall be given <S%H3052><s%> <S%H8725><s%> into his hand <S%H3028><s%> until <S%H5705><s%> a time <S%H5732><s%> and times <S%H5732><s%> and the dividing <S%H6387><s%> of time <S%H5732><s%>.

But the judgment <S%H1780><s%> shall sit <S%H3488><s%> <S%H8754><s%>, and they shall take away <S%H5709><s%> <S%H8681><s%> his dominion <S%H7985><s%>, to consume <S%H8046><s%> <S%H8682><s%> and to destroy <S%H7><s%> <S%H8682><s%> it unto <S%H5705><s%> the end <S%H5491><s%>.

And the kingdom <S%H4437><s%> and dominion <S%H7985><s%>, and the greatness <S%H7238><s%> of the kingdom <S%H4437><s%> under <S%H8460><s%> the whole <S%H3606><s%> heaven <S%H8065><s%>, shall be given <S%H3052><s%> <S%H8753><s%> to the people <S%H5972><s%> of the saints <S%H6922><s%> of Ha `Elyon <S%H5946><s%>, whose kingdom <S%H4437><s%> is an everlasting <S%H5957><s%> kingdom <S%H4437><s%>, and all <S%H3606><s%> dominions <S%H7985><s%> shall serve <S%H6399><s%> <S%H8748><s%> and obey <S%H8086><s%> <S%H8721><s%> him.

Hitherto <S%H5705><s%> <S%H3542><s%> is the end <S%H5491><s%> of the matter <S%H4406><s%>. As for me <S%H576><s%> Daniel <S%H1841><s%>, my cogitations <S%H7476><s%> much <S%H7690><s%> troubled <S%H927><s%> <S%H8792><s%> me, and my countenance <S%H2122><s%> changed <S%H8133><s%> <S%H8721><s%> in me <S%H5922><s%>: but I kept <S%H5202><s%> <S%H8754><s%> the matter <S%H4406><s%> in my heart <S%H3821><s%>.
